title: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes
description: The Open Type dialog in JDK 1.4 includes obfuscated classes (such as a, a1, b, c, d). These obfuscated classes are currently displayed prominently in the dialog.
OB: The obfuscated classes are shown prominently in the Open Type dialog.
EB: The obfuscated classes should be displayed less prominently in the Open Type dialog.
SR:
1. Launch the application.
2. Open the Open Type dialog.
3. Observe the prominence of the obfuscated classes in the dialog.
